data.title: Used Southworth LS4-48W Lift Table
data.meta-description: Used Southworth LS4-48W Lift Table For Sale at ASI, 4,000 lb. capacity, 48" x 66" platform, 3.2 HP motor, In Stock and ready to ship, learn more information about our Used Southworth LS4-48W Lift Table

long-description.p: Used Southworth LS4-48W Lift Table for sale at American Surplus is in stock. This lift table has a massive 48" wide x 66" deep platform. The platform has a 4,000 lb. (two ton) capacity. It runs off of a 3.2 HP motor. When lowered, the overall height of this lift table is only 22" high. Call our salesman to learn more about this Used Southworth LS4-48W Lift Table.

p.strong: We can’t list our entire inventory online, if you do not see what you are looking for, just ask! Quantity discounts available on used lift tables 40-60% off the price of new. Call 800-876-3736 for additional information & a free quote. American Surplus will provide a quote on new equipment if used is unavailable. Nationwide shipping is available. Price and product availability subject to change without notice. Inventory is subject to prior sale.
